story_teamaquamagma_01_06000/2401_1001_0:
Right in the middle of town... What is the meaning
of this, Archie?

What are you sayin’? Groudon was the one that
attacked us first!

But y’know what? I’ve been itching to fight you
guys anyway!

Are you aware that if Groudon and Kyogre keep
on fighting like this—
story_teamaquamagma_01_06000/2401_1001_1:
Of course we know! Do YOU understand what
could happen?!
We were operating carefully to avoid this...
*sigh* Fighting here is such a pointless endeavor.
Return, Groudon. Do not entertain them anymore.

Tch! That ain’t the least bit satisfying.
We’re leaving, Kyogre!

Hey! Cut it out, Kyogre! Can’t you hear
my orders?!
